SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Managers

Class KeyEventHandlers

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Managers.KeyEventHandlers
public class KeyEventHandlers extends Object
KeyEventHandlers class handles the keyboard events, which includes movements, firing, and pausing. It manages interaction between the player's inputs and game logic through UserPlane and LevelParent classes.

    • handleKeyPressed

      protected void handleKeyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode keyCode)
      Handles key press events by performing appropriate action based on key pressed.
      Parameters:
      keyCode - : key code of the pressed key

    • handleKeyReleased

      protected void handleKeyReleased(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode keyCode)
      Handles key release events by stopping movement or resetting firing state.
      Parameters:
      keyCode - the key code of the released key

    • addPauseKeyBinding

      Key binding for pause action
      Parameters:
      scene - : Game scene to which the pause key binding will be added.
      togglePauseAction - : Action to be executed when pause key is pressed.
